Container.Name: MusicBrainz
Container.Description: nginx [engine x] is an HTTP and reverse proxy server, as well as a mail proxy server, written by Igor Sysoev[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is used to store the configuration and the SSL certs files of the reverse proxy.[br] [b]/web[/b] : this path is the web directory[br]
